name: Warrior
description: The Warrior is a medium humanoid characterized by its combat abilities and basic survival skills. It is equipped with a spear for melee and ranged attacks.
memorable: Its versatility in combat and good perception skills make it a capable opponent despite its low hit points.
goals: Engage enemies in combat, either up close or at a distance, using tactical decision-making.
strengths: The Warrior excels in both melee and ranged combat with decent awareness of its surroundings.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points and basic attributes make it less effective in prolonged encounters.
attacks: Uses a spear that allows for melee and ranged attacks with a good chance to hit, dealing 4 piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Good perception adds to its awareness, allowing it to notice hidden threats.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, indicating strong awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in athletics, stealth, and survival skills, indicating good capability in physical contests.
additional_information: Challenge rating of 1/8 makes it suitable for low-level encounters.
Average physical and mental attributes reflect a basic fighter.
Basic survival skills contribute to navigating through environments.
Can attack at a distance of up to 60 feet with disadvantage.
Not particularly resilient, making it vulnerable in extended battles.
test_queries: medium warrior skilled in athletics and stealth
warrior with average resilience and perception
